Being overencumbered only slows down your activities, but doesn't affect travel.

Repair the bank

Repair the bank
Main Skill: Carpentry
Max Efficiency: 200%

Using some ectoplasm with your carpentry skills, you repair the necessities of the bank to restore it back to being usable.

The Repair the bank activity is a Carpentry activity.

Location

This activity can be done at the following location:

  • Wraithwater in Wallisia

Visibility

This is a hidden activity.
It is only visible if you haven't done the following:

  • Complete actions of the Repair the bank activity. [1]

Requirements

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Carpentry lvl. 58.

Other Requirements:

  • Have item Spectral saw equipped.

Items Required

This activity requires the following items be supplied for each action:

  • 50x   Ectoplasm
